name: wood wide web
description:
how to play:

- press ESC to spawn nutrients ;
- click around the screen & find out cool effects ;
- experience the forest !

─•~❉❦❉~•─

a warm, earthy game for plants... and people who love them! 

wood wide web offers a relaxing experience of hand-made art & graph-driven pathfinding.

─•~❉❦❉~•─

we employed traditional media, like stamps and ink drawings, for ALL the game art! 

every asset was photographed with our mobile phones and later added to the engine to create the dreamy, scrapbook-style forest landscape.
